00009              if (function_exists('xdebug_start_code_coverage')) {
00010 
00011 /**
00012  * include this file inside your config.php to get a codecoverage overview of your webapp.
00013  * note: you need the xdebug extension
00014  *
00015  * @author mnt@codeninja.de
00016  *

00023                           function kataCodeCoverage() {
00024                                        $data= xdebug_get_code_coverage(XDEBUG_CC_DEAD_CODE | XDEBUG_CC_UNUSED);
00025                                        ksort($data);
00026                                        foreach ($data as $name => & $lines) {
00027                                                     if (substr($name, 0, strlen(ROOT)) != ROOT) {
00028                                                                  continue;
00029                                                     }
00030 
00031                                                     $temp= explode(DS, $name);
00032                                                     if (in_array('lib',$temp)) {
00033                                                                  continue;
00034                                                     }
00035                                                     $shortFile= array_pop($temp);
00036                                                     $shortDir = array_pop($temp);
00037                                                     $shortName= $shortDir.DS.$shortFile;
00038 
00039                                                     if (($shortDir == 'config') || ($shortName == 'webroot'.DS.'index.php')) {
00040                                                                  continue;
00041                                                     }
00042 
00043                                                     echo '<br /><h2>'.$shortName.'</h2>';
00044 
00045                                                     if ($shortDir == 'lang') {
00046                                                                  echo 'skipping... '.$shortDir.' <br />';
00047                                                                  continue;
00048                                                     }
00049 
00050                                                     $file= file($name);
00051                                                     $tdCell = '<td style="border:1px solid red;padding:2px;">';
00052                                                     echo '<table style="min-width:100%;border:1px solid red;color:black;background-color:#e8e8e8;border-collapse:collapse;">';
00053                                                     foreach ($file as $lineno => $line) {
00054                                                                  $count= 0;
00055                                                                  if (isset ($lines[$lineno +1])) {
00056                                                                               $count = $lines[$lineno +1];
00057                                                                  }
00058                                                                  if ($count>2) {
00059                                                                               $count = 3;
00060                                                                  }
00061 
00062                                                                  echo '<tr>'.$tdCell.$lineno.'</td>'.$tdCell.'<tt';
00063                                                                  switch ($count) {
00064                                                                               case 0:echo ' style="color:#c0c0c0;"';break;
00065                                                                               case 1:echo '';break;
00066                                                                               case 2:
00067                                                                               case 3:echo ' style="color:#ffe0e0;"';break;
00068                                                                  }
00069                                                                  echo '>'.h($line).'</tt></td></tr>';
00070                                                     }
00071                                                     echo '</table>';
00072 
00073                                        }
00074                                        unset ($lines);
00075                                        echo '</table>';
00076                           }
00077                           register_shutdown_function('kataCodeCoverage');
00078                           xdebug_start_code_coverage();
00079 
00080              } else {
00081                           kataDebugOutput('You need a current XDebug-Extension!');
00082              }
00083 }
